locations.name: Moremi Game Reserve
locations.description: Located in the Okavango Delta, renowned for diverse ecosystems combining wetlands and dry savannah, excellent wildlife viewing including the Big Five and wild dogs. Overnight stays are in mobile camps.

locations.name: Khwai Community Concession
locations.description: Adjacent to Moremi, famous for predator sightings (lions, leopards, wild dogs) and abundant plains game along the Khwai River. Offers exclusive mobile camping experiences.

locations.name: Chobe National Park
locations.description: Specifically focusing on the Chobe Riverfront area, known for having the highest concentration of elephants in the world, plus hippos, crocodiles, and diverse birdlife, often viewed via river cruises.
